subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal moved one victory from his eighth Barcelona Open title in nine years when he thrashed fifth-seeded Milos Raonic to set up a final against fourth-seeded Nicolas Almágro.
snippet: Rafael Nadal moved one victory from his eighth Barcelona Open title in nine years when he thrashed fifth-seeded Milos Raonic to set up a final against fourth-seeded Nicolas Almágro.
